title: Test Post #1
author: Eric
body:
T﻿his is the first test post I am making on this page. I don't know if there is really anything else needed to be said so I'll test out some features. 

L﻿et's try making something *emphasized*

L﻿et's try making things **bold**

L﻿et's try the different headers

# Header 1

## Header 2

### Header 3

#### Header 4

L﻿et's try making something a [link](google.com)\
\
L﻿et's try listing some things out. 

* Eric
* E﻿van 
* A﻿ndrew
* M﻿ack
